short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom JS and CSS to make the AWS SSO Login Page usable. Currently only works for CBC

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Addon will change the look of the AWS SSO Login Page. It adds a search, filter and an organized view for all accounts. Currently it only works for CBC/Mediengruppe RTL environment.


Changelog:
0.9.7
- Add Option for ADA

0.9.6
- Removed activeTab Permission as it is not needed.

0.9.4
- Works with DMH****

0.9.3
- Now works also with Read Only Roles
- changed layout a little bit
